text: 10.28: Lo 17.6; 19.15; Zo 8.17; 2 Ko 13.1Nza kaŋgi, guma the Fhe Bakɨme Moses ga nɨɨŋgi tɨvi khara thɨgɨp, tɨva mbatɨk thueŋ muuŋgirga, guma phuni o, phuni khegene ana muuŋgi tɨva mbatɨgeŋ gangip, ne bun suaŋgirga, mbe mba guman korar muuŋgirga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Mbe ana shogirim, ana rimgirga. Ne guigi guarara.
